QuestData.Title: The Healing of Shen-zin Su
QuestData.Description: This is what comes of such recklessness. How could he think this was even a possibility?$B$BNevermind, there's no time for that now. We need to act to save Shen-zin Su.$B$BFind any healers you can! Rescue them, relieve them - whatever you need to do to get them over here healing the wound.$B$BKeep the healers safe at all costs!
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue and defend healers until Shen-zin Su's wound is healed.
